entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TapGestureRecognizer not working with TableView #19348
  • Local Notifications in .NET MAUI Essentials custom sound is not working #19346
  • Re-enable semantic tests on iOS #19345
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Testing] iOS compatibility tests currently failing on main #19343
  • Button multitrigger setter hangs Maui app #19342
  • Embedding an iOS ContentView or Layout does not get a size #19340
    Backlog
  • Restore failures - change version, delete bin/obj, reload #19339
  • [iOS] Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header #19338
    Backlog
  • ListView Grouping - Items are not appearing and Produces blank headers and on Android. #19334
    Backlog
  • CascadeInputTransparent not working #19332
    Backlog
  • SwipeItems referencing causes crash on Android. [Duplicate of #18429] #19331
  • View Following Cursor via PoitnerGesture Will Flicker In AbsoluteLayout #19330
    Backlog
  • [macOS] `PointerEventArgs.GetPosition(relativeTo: view)` does not give correct values (absolute instead of relative ones?) #19329
    Backlog
  • [UITest] AutomationId not being set in Shell Tabbar #19328
  • iOS - Incorrect Coordinates Returned by TapGestureRecognizer #19327
  • Maui Blazor App Without Root Page (@page "/") Does No Longer Work (Error 'Not Found') With .NET 8 #19326

Closed

  • [UITests] Windows Controls Tests Are failing too often #19350
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [regression/8.0.0] TapGestureRecognizers not working in maui embedded #17948
    .NET 8 SR2
  • AzDO Android build has error with `appium-doctor` #19239
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] Grid * Row is broken on iOS #17581
    .NET 8 SR2
  • ScrollView with Fill vertical option is bigger than the page when ScrollView is a root on iOS #18975
  • Picker SelectedIndexChanged makes selected item not visible #19162
  • [When using Resharper] Incremental build not working in MAUI for android target #19282
  • [Spec] Maui HotReload #3120
    Backlog
  • Can't publish a Maui app that references a class library on Windows without modifying the project #8304
    Under Consideration
  • .Net Maui using VS 2022 Community Edition #17816
  • problem with .NET MAUI #17650
  • Could not implement ICLLocationManagerDelegate anymore #19294
  • Error DEP0700 on defualt MAUI template #19325

PullRequests

Created

  • Schedule Android layout requests received during layout on the UI thread #19349
  • Remove circular reference from ShapeDrawable #19347
  • Disable failing semantic tests on iOS #19344
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • Preserve logs from retries as they have data! #19341
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • XamlC WarnAsErrors. #19337
  • [X] CSS specificity #19335
    area/Xaml </>

Merged

  • Allow GesturePlatformManager to be created for views with null window… #18938
    community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Improve appium install on CI build agents #19248
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Testing] Added lifecycle methods to UITest #19102
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Added DragCoordinates action to appium UITest #19333
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Add scroll methods to UITest #19181
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19316
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fix for #11991 - CollectionView SelectedItem BackgroundColor is always Gray on iOS #17464
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [WinUI] Add workaround for Connectivity check on Win10 #19261
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, area/desktop 🖥️, partner/cat 😻
  • [net9.0] Update net9.0 with new versions #19236
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Allow for disabling default MAUI usings when embedding #19314
    area/native-embedding
  • Consolidate all the test handler construction #16200
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale, Under Consideration
  • Save device logs when UI Tests fail #19085
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, legacy-ui-test
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D9 #18762
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test C3 #18899
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-refreshview, stale
  • Add design time converters #19301
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Make Flyout footer aware of header/content margin #19303
    platform/android 🤖
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • NativeAOT: Add integration tests for testing MAUI compatibility with NativeAOT on iOS #19194
    community ✨
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    community ✨
